scenario.name: SIP_INVITE_location_garbled_PIDF-LO_body
scenario.send:
INVITE urn:service:sos SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port] From: SENDER <sip:SENDER@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: urn:service:sos Call-ID: [call_id] Cseq: 1 INVITE Contact: sip:SENDER@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Call-Info: urn:emergency:uid:callid:123ABCdefg123ABCdefg123ABCdefg12:test.com Call-Info: urn:emergency:uid:incidentid:123ABCdefg123ABCdefg123ABCdefg12:test.com Resource-Priority: esnet.1 Geolocation: <cid:1729610060@test.com> Content-Length: [len] Content-Type: multipart/mixed;boundary=next-content

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <presence xmlns="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:pidf" xmlns:dm="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:pidf:data-model" xmlns:gp="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:pidf:geopriv10" xmlns:gml="http://www.opengis.net/gml" xmlns:cl="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:pidf:geopriv10:civicAddr" entity="pres:test@example.com"> </cl:civicAddress> </gp:location-info> <gp:usage-rules/> <gp:method>Wiremap</gp:method> </gp:geopriv> <dm:deviceID>mac:9a514281aa3d</dm:deviceID> <dm:timestamp>2024-10-30T20:00:00Z</dm:timestamp> </dm:device> </presence>
